import { Fragment, useRef, useState } from "react"; import { Dialog, Transition } from "@headlessui/react"; export default function AddSale() { const [sale, setSale] = useState({ productId: "", storeId: "", quantity: "", saleDate: "", totalSaleAmount: "", }); console.log("Sale: ", sale); const [open, setOpen] = useState(true); const cancelButtonRef = useRef(null); const updateSale = (key, value) => { console.log(key); setSale({ ...sale, [key]: value }); }; const addSale = () => { fetch("http://localhost:4000/api/Sale/add", { method: "POST", headers: { "Content-type": "application/json", }, body: JSON.stringify(sale), }) .then((result) => { alert("SALE DETAILS ADDED"); setOpen(false); }) .catch((err) => console.log(err)); }; return (
Sale Details
updateSale(e.target.name, e.target.value) } />
